text: The Last Train () is a 2002 Argentine Spanish Uruguayan comedy-drama movie directed by Diego Arsuaga and starring Héctor Alterio, Federico Luppi, Pepe Soriano, Gastón Pauls, Alfonso Tort. ==Other websites== * . title: The Last Train
